Head.focus: Source of mental pressure and inspiration, driving the search for meaning and answers.

Ajna.focus: Processing and conceptualizing information, forming beliefs and ideas.

Throat.focus: Expressing and manifesting thoughts and ideas into actions and forms.

G-Center.focus: Sense of direction, love, and identity, influencing navigation through life.

Heart/Ego.focus: Center of willpower and ego, driving material success, commitment, and value.

Sacral.focus: Source of life force, creativity, and sexuality, providing stamina and vitality.

Spleen.focus: Center of intuition and survival instincts, linked to health and well-being.

Solar Plexus.focus: Processing and experiencing emotions, ranging from joy to pain.

Root.focus: Source of stress and pressure, driving the need for action and resolution.
